channel.title: [PI] Help
channel.description:
I'm desperate for this. I've been looking everywhere and I've had trouble with this for a week+. I've tried multiple things but I can't get it resolved. My problem is when you die in my server you don't lose your items and the killer doesn't get your items. I believe the error is in PlayerAssistant.java and I've messed with that a lot. I attempted to fix it but failed and made it so only Donors lose items when they die.
Some extra information: In Ardougne PK you lose items but nowhere else. Please help, I'm in need of this.

item.title: [PI] Help
item.dc:creator: @Ch3ck Ch3ck
item.description:
@Ch3ck wrote:

I’m desperate for this. I’ve been looking everywhere and I’ve had trouble with this for a week+. I’ve tried multiple things but I can’t get it resolved. My problem is when you die in my server you don’t lose your items and the killer doesn’t get your items. I believe the error is in PlayerAssistant.java and I’ve messed with that a lot. I attempted to fix it but failed and made it so only Donors lose items when they die.

Some extra information: In Ardougne PK you lose items but nowhere else.
Please help, I’m in need of this.

Read full topic
